normalized_poster.payload_xml: <?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?> <featuredAnimalPoster continent="Antarctica"> <animal> <name>Emperor Penguin</name> <image url="https://www.shutterstock.com/image-photo/two-penguins-their-baby-penguin-family-2056711106" /> <description>On the endless white ice, emperor penguins huddle together against brutal polar winds. Their black backs soak up scarce sunlight while golden cheek patches glow like a sunrise. Devoted parents balance eggs on their warm feet to keep them off the ice.</description> </animal> </featuredAnimalPoster>
